column4: i run breezy with xfce4... now, i try to access my usb drive, which is can do by mount it from dev to mnt. i can take files, but i cannot delete or add files. what would be a solution? sry for repeat
did you format the usb drive ntfs?
i believe so, it has worked under gnome perfectly.
you were probably using the gnome automount before, you'll have to mount it as a user which you can do after modifying /etc/fstab or set up a different automount.
